ComicInfo.Title: Good Intentions; Something To Keep Us Apart
ComicInfo.Summary:
WHY WE LOVE IT: A big part of what makes HELLRAISER a horror classic is its expansive world and deep mythology, and annuals give us an opportunity to dive deeper!
WHY YOU WILL LOVE IT: Brandon Seifert created and writes one of our favorite horror procedurals, WITCH DOCTOR, and truly understands what makes the Cenobites tick.
WHAT IT’S ABOUT: In this extra-large special issue, Brandon Seifert and Ben Meares go even deeper into the mysteries of Leviathan and his plans for Harry D’Amour, Kirsty Cotton, and Elliott Spencer.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-09 08:01:30. [CVDB431486]
ComicInfo.Writer: Ben Meares, Brandon Seifert, Clive Barker
ComicInfo.Penciller: Janusz Ordon, Jesus Hervas, Janusz Ordon, Jesus Hervas
ComicInfo.Inker: Janusz Ordon, Jesus Hervas, Janusz Ordon, Jesus Hervas
ComicInfo.Characters: Butterfield, Edgar Boyle, Kirsty Cotton, Leviathan, Pinhead
